idea:
KUKU FM is a social audio platform for Indian languages where users can find great quality audio shows ranging from Audiobooks to thriller stories. We are reinventing the traditional radio with a mission to build a internet scale platform to bring together communities to share stories and spread knowledge.
Started by IIT Jodhpur alumni, KUKU FM has grown to 150k+ users and more than 1,000 creators in less than 3 months.
name: MEBIGO LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Apicem Advisors & Consultants Private Limited (“Apicem Advisors”) is an advisory firm, focusing on providing professional services to Funds, Fund manager, Startups, other entities. Its competencies and track record enable it to become a preferred partner for the entire spectrum of fund/ corporate set-up and ongoing compliances, supporting transactions, accounting & taxation services, valuations, Transaction Advisory & other professional services. 

We at Apicem Advisors with a team of professionals works with these companies for all their needs, thereby providing all services under one roof.

Apicem Advisors was set up in May 2018 and have professionals being CA, CS, semi-qualified professionals and trainees coming together to synergise expertise of each other.
name: APICEM ADVISORS AND CONSULTANTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a young Information Technology company providing various Authentication products and Solutions.


All our Public Key Infrastructure(PKI) & Cryptographic solutions are sold under brand name JISA. With strong core competencies in Cryptography and PKI, JISA offers solutions built around Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), the framework that brings confidentiality, authentication, privacy, and non-repudiation.

“JISA has an entire range of software applications based on cryptographic algorithms and protocols”

We at JISA are focused on the design, develop, sales and support of various Hardware and Software solutions. We have done an extensive market research on various requirement of market and included suitable solution in our Solution Portfolio.

JISA's India R&D centre situated in Pune, is a core of a team with excellent technicians and think-tankers with the only objective of delivering simple, efficient and powerful device that meets one’s, particularly routine requirements on technological front. It is our endeavor to provide our consumers, a taste of the technology ahead.

Vision

To become an internationally known brand in the field of PKI (Public Key Infrastructure) Cryptography by year 2020 in 5 countries.

Mission

- Offering international standard PKI solutions at an affordable       price.

- Applying PKI & Cryptography in day to day transactions /     activities.

- To be one stop solution for all PKI & Cryptography                   solutions.

- To be known for quality, flexibility, customization and best             customer service.
name: JISA SOFTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Zitasoft Infotech is an IT startup involved in developing new technologies and products. We are more focused on Web-Based Technologies. Also worked on improving a business process using state of the art IT solutions which are tailored made for your business.

VDigitalize is the brand name of the company. Through this brand, we provide website development, digital marketing, mobile apps, graphics & animation services to our customer.  Along with that, we have various other websites as follows:

JobWover - https://www.jobwover.com 
This website provides a platform for job seekers and employers to find the best resource for there business.  

Zilister - https://www.zilister.com 
Zilister is a local buy sell portal, which essentially connects buyer to seller and seller to buyer. Here anyone can post the free product, services ads. 

VDig - https://www.vdig.in 
VDig is a free URL shortener and advertisement platform. With this portal user can earn money is someone click on the ad which is displayed on their link. A Great platform for passive-income. 

Studyinfinity - https://studyinfinity.in 
This is an E-learning Portal which connects teacher or mentor with students, here teacher or mentor or admin can create courses both free and paid. 

CRMFlow - https://crmflow.io
The best tool for small startups or mid-sized companies to manage there customers, projects, invoices, expenses, resources.
name: ZITASOFT INFOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Manash Lifestyle Private Limited (the “Company”) is a private Company domiciled in India. The Company owns and operates an online marketplace namely www.purplle.com and provides platform services for the sale and purchase of branded products in the beauty and personal care category.
name: Manash Lifestyle Private Limited

idea:
SSIDNIK ENTERPRISES PRIVATE LIMITED is a legal holding entity for Oakleeaf. 
Oakleeaf specialises in following two product catergories
1. Training school kids on latest Technology and Robotics. The mission is to create 1000 creative entrepreneurs in field of manufacturing and product development.  We start from basic and give exposure in a structured manner in field of robotics. We need support on product development, funding and online presence.

2. Child psychology products which helps these kids to be internaly strong to face any situations and overcome internal challenges like phobias, laziness, negativity, self image and labelling, parenting atmosphere etc.
name: SSIDNIK ENTERPRISES PRIVATE LIMITED
